title: Quadditch
extended_details: This project is about re-creating the famous Harry Potter Quidditch game using quadcopters in place of broomsticks! Each quadcopter will behave like a wizard/witch, having the ability to catch and launch balls into a designated goal or to other quadcopters while flying! Let the games begin!
